evilWithin:GremlinMatchGame.NAME: Match and Keep!
DESCRIPTIONS: " ... #bTwelve cards! Match them to keep them! #bFive tries... no do-overs. NL Are you ready? Let's start!"
You complete the gremlin's game and look up. NL He disappeared?
A gremlin is madly shuffling cards on a table. This monster seems to be a harmless one. As you approach, he nervously breaks his composure for a moment, but finds the courage to address you.
Unwilling to partake in this trivial game, you glare at the Gremlin with a threatening stance. NL He runs away!
